description: HTML file for the Database Viewer web interface, including layout, styling, and client-side JavaScript for managing database views, tables, and data visualization.

methods.name: loadDatabases
methods.description: Fetches the list of databases from the API and populates the sidebar.

methods.name: refreshDatabases
methods.description: Refreshes the database list, resetting current selections.

methods.name: toggleDatabase
methods.description: Expands or collapses the database to show/hide its tables.

methods.name: loadTables
methods.description: Fetches and displays tables for a selected database.

methods.name: loadTableData
methods.description: Loads and displays data for a selected table.

methods.name: renderTable
methods.description: Renders a data table with dynamic columns based on fetched data.

methods.name: renderCell
methods.description: Creates table cell HTML, handling long text and objects.

methods.name: expandCell
methods.description: Expands or collapses cell content for long strings or objects.
